document.discussion_title: Chinese envoy visits Taiwan amid protests
document.topic_text: TAIPEI, Taiwan (AP) — A Chinese envoy arrived in Taiwan Monday for a city-to-city dialogue, amid a chill in relations between the sides following the inauguration of the island's independence-leaning president Tsai ing-wen in June.
document.post: TAIPEI, Taiwan (AP) — A Chinese envoy arrived in Taiwan Monday for a city-to-city dialogue, amid a chill in relations between the sides following the inauguration of the island's independence-leaning president Tsai ing-wen in June.
